summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5825 for the improvement of East Boston Terrace, as established by Ordinance Nos. 75421, 75422, 75423 and 75424, from approximately 22 feet south of the lot line between Lots "G" and "H" to approximately 40 feet north of the lot line between Lots "U" and "V", Plat of Cape Horn Addition, unrecorded, by restoring the roadway with a creosoted trestle with concrete deck; under Ordinance No. 76781 as amended by Ordinance No. 76854, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
